snippet.title: Fancy Pants Adventures: GDC Trailer
snippet.description:
A new trailer from GDC 2011 for the Fancy Pants Adventures on Xbox 360. You're a stick figure. You've got fancy pants. It's time to kick pirate butt.

IGN's YouTube is just a taste of our content. Get more:
http://www.ign.com

Want this week's top videos? Sign up:
http://go.ign.com/VideoRound-up
